name: strava-activity-visualizer
description: A beautiful web application that generates shareable graphics of Strava activities using pink and green themes

scripts.build: pnpm --filter fe-pinggerr build && pnpm --filter be-pinggerr build
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && pnpm --filter fe-pinggerr install && pnpm --filter be-pinggerr install

author: Your Name
